product_name: The North Face Windwall II Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Windwall 2 fleece jacket combines insulating fleece and a wind-blocking membrane to help shield you from windchill when you're facing cold, blustery weather. Windwall 2 is made from 200-weight fleece and drastically reduces the effect of windchill on cold, windy days; it also offers ideal insulation when layered. Windwall 2 fleece fabric blocks approximately 95% of the wind, yet allows enough airflow to help ensure dry, ventilated comfort. Fabric also features brushed fleece backing for warmth and uses a unique fabric-bonding process that allows limited external air permeability. Jacket features brushed collar lining, elastic-bound cuffs and a drawcord hem. Zippered hand pockets and a Napoleon chest pocket; standard fit ensures freedom of motion. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Windwall 2 fleece jacket combines insulating fleece and a wind-blocking membrane to help shield you from windchill when you're facing cold, blustery weather.
